channel.title: Resolved
channel.description:
[size=50pt]RESOLVED![/size]
the code i was looking for was !c.playerHasItem(3706, 150)
This means if the player doesnt have 150 pvp rings then it wont work FULLY WORKING NOW!!!

or anything to do with if u dont have enough

Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2009, 10:42:56 am[/size][hr]any body know how to do anything to do with making a shop but not a wanneshop i just want a shop like the PC point exchange![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2009, 01:26:41 am[/size][hr]would something like this work???
